LDAP.NAME: LDAP Name
LDAP.ErrLDAPNameRule: Only A-z and 0-9 is required. Also you may type several words.
LDAP.hostReqFAQ: The address must be a hostname or an IP. The IP address must be 4 numbers separated by a period. Each number must be a value from 0 to 255.( Example: 178.210.192.2 ). Also you can type a host name (Example: my.host.net ) or type IP and host separated by comma.
LDAP.ErrPassREGEX: You should type at least: 1 number, 1 lowercase letter, 1 uppercase letter, at least 1 special character.
